figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: PRISMA (Page et al., 2021) flowchart of the selection process.

figure_2.title: Figure 2.
figure_2.caption: Forest plot of effect size (Hedges’ g) in a random-effects model.

figure_3.title: Figure 3.
figure_3.caption: Funnel plot of effect size data.

claims.sentence: The process flowchart for the search, identification, screening, coding and extraction stages in our investigation is presented in Figure 1.

Overall effect of gamification on student learning outcomes
Figure 2 displays a forest plot that presents 49 independent studies with a total of 5,071 participants along with their author(s), publication year, Hedge’s g (organized by effect size), standard error, variance, confidence interval, Z-value, and value of p.
The funnel plot in Figure 3 presents a generally symmetrical dispersion around the weighted mean effect sizes.
The process flowchart for the search, identification, screening, coding and extraction stages in our investigation is presented in Figure 1.
